Name: Photo Studio
About the game: VR and NON-VR game play mode (for NON-VR mode just turn off power on your headset) You are a professional photographer in a big city, and top models are begging you to work with them. Every minute of your working day is scheduled. You equipped your photo studio with the best possible equipment to make really high quality photos. In your photo studio you can: + Explore rooms in the house + Set up light in each lamp + Make photos by using photo camera with digital display + Make photos by using photo camera mode with filters and zooming + Record videos by using video camera + On/Off clothes, masks, hair on models + Change makeup and eyes color on models + Model is changing poses like a real fashion model + Switch between Anya, Albina and Cristy models + Video screen with your own YouTube (vimeo, bilibili and more other sites) playlist + Voice commands Light manipulation : Ceiling lamp (Intensity) Studio lamp 1 (Intensity, Temperature) Studio lamp 2 (Intensity, Temperature) Focus floor 1 (Intensity, Temperature) Focus floor 2 (Intensity, Temperature) Focus ceiling 1 (Intensity, Temperature) Focus ceiling 2 (Intensity, Temperature) Music on/off Your own YouTube play list Characters: Anya Albina Cristy Jamal Trevis Naomi All characters have 60 automatic facial emotions Animation: 18 glamours 14 Model posing 4 Charming 4 Motion Heidi 3 Casual movies 3 POP dance 4 Music video dance + 32 club dance + 17 High rhythm dance + 15 Mid rhythm dance + 19 Slow rhythm dance + 8 Short dance + 20 hot dance movies for hit songs: Power dances inspired by popular super stars: Crazy In Love Level Up Boombayah On The Floor Ain't Your Mama Seductive dances from top billboard songs: Poker Face Oops I Did It Again Genie Playing With Fire Dance The Night Away Sexy choreography for seductive movies: Don't Cha Toxic Like A Cat Baam Bubble Pop Cute dance choreography from k-pop hits: All About That Bass Like Ooh Ahh BBoom BBoom Me Gustas Tu Glass Bead Additionally in NON VR version: + Play as male + Play as female + Main player full body + Main player dressing (in the Esc menu) + Main player walk/idle Play the VR and NON-VR variants of the game and find out what else you can do in your new photo studio!
